title: South African Mercenaries Play Crucial Role In Fight Against Boko Haram
teaser: The Islamist group Boko Haram has recently been pushed out of villages and towns in northern Nigeria. Renee Montagne talks to Adam Nossiter, the West Africa bureau chief for The New York Times.
